task.en: In "System Settings > Appearance", set accent color to red.
task.zh: 在“系统设置 > 外观”中，将强调色设置为红色。
task.ar: في "إعدادات النظام > المظهر"، قم بتعيين اللون المميز إلى الأحمر.
task.ja: 「システム設定 > 外観」でアクセントカラーを赤に設定してください。
task.ru: В «Системные настройки > Внешний вид» установите цвет акцента на красный.

grading_command: defaults read -g AppleAccentColor 2>/dev/null | grep -q "0" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "Appearance" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "外观" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "المظهر" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "外観" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "Оформление" && echo "True" || echo "False"
osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get name of first process whose frontmost is true' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "System Settings" && echo "True" || echo "False"
